description: While scouting, Anonsky spots an anomaly, leading the team to set up camp for discussion. They decide to follow his lead despite Danila Matador's caution. The next day, they navigate an irradiated area and discover a hidden artifact emitting strange sounds. As they examine it, Fanatic hears distant howls, prompting Danila to suggest a hasty retreat. They are soon confronted by mutant dogs, resulting in chaos where Egorka Orderly is severely wounded and left behind despite Sarik's attempts to help. Mourning Egorka's loss, Sarik urges the team to move on, while Anonsky vows to protect the artifact in his memory.
